policy.name: Route
policy.description: Policy to cover the life cycle of Route

user.name: NCR Read
user.filter: ((to[Object Route].from.type.kindof[NCR] ~~ true) || (to[Object Route].from.type.kindof[NCR Product Control] ~~ true)) && (to[Object Route].from.current.access[show] ~~ true)

user.name: NCR Modify
user.filter: ((to[Object Route].from.type.kindof[NCR] ~~ true) || (to[Object Route].from.type.kindof[NCR Product Control] ~~ true)) && (to[Object Route].from.current.access[modify] ~~ true)

user.name: NCR Modify
user.filter: ((to[Object Route].from.type.kindof[NCR] ~~ true) || (to[Object Route].from.type.kindof[NCR Product Control] ~~ true)) && (to[Object Route].from.current.access[modify] ~~ true)
